description: [ZxShell](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0412) has a feature to capture a remote computer's keystrokes using a keylogger.(Citation: FireEye APT41 Aug 2019)(Citation: Talos ZxShell Oct 2014)

external_references.description: Fraser, N., et al. (2019, August 7). Double DragonAPT41, a dual espionage and cyber crime operation APT41. Retrieved September 23, 2019.
Allievi, A., et al. (2014, October 28). Threat Spotlight: Group 72, Opening the ZxShell. Retrieved September 24, 2019.
